title: A New World of Bundled Payments is Upon Us: Are Hospitals Ready?
description: In July, the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) continued its bold endeavor into the world of value-based healthcare with an announcement that introduced a mandatory bundled payment for care for heart attacks and for cardiac bypass surgery.
body: In July, the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) continued its bold endeavor into the world of value-based healthcare with an announcement that introduced a mandatory bundled payment for care for heart attacks and for cardiac bypass surgery.

title: 15 ways MACRA causes seismic shifts in healthcare IT
description: Final rule includes tough stands on interoperability, blocking and EHR certification.
body: Final rule includes tough stands on interoperability, blocking and EHR certification.

title: Is Home-Based Medical-Data Collection About to Change Healthcare? | ACO, data analytics, Medicare, population health | HealthLeaders Media
description: Patient data informatics can improve clinical outcomes, but stakeholders will have to build a seamless flow of information and win over skeptical patients.
body: Patient data informatics can improve clinical outcomes, but stakeholders will have to build a seamless flow of information and win over skeptical patients.

title: 8 Key Facts About MACRA
description: Doctors are trying to learn about MACRA before it officially starts. Here are eight important details you need to know.

title: The Biggest Issues For The Future Of Healthcare In America And What We Can Learn From Them, Part I
description: A patent-centric and patient-focused model requires healthcare providers to change their businesses to a relationship-based model in which they provide value and grow together with their patients and customers from birth to end of life.
body: A patent-centric and patient-focused model requires healthcare providers to change their businesses to a relationship-based model in which they provide value and grow together with their patients and customers from birth to end of life.

title: Small practices struggling to adjust to new payment incentives
description: MACRA changes will place emphasis on different IT capabilities, says Ken Bradley.

title: Another MACRA Survey Reveals Alarmingly Low Levels of Knowledge
description: Nearly nine in 10 respondents to a Medscape survey said that they either have not heard of, don't know a lot about, or know a little bit about the Medicare Access and CHIP Reauthorization Act of 2015 (MACRA) and its core components. Read the full article here . Learn more about nThrive's MACRA Management Solution.
body:
Nearly nine in 10 respondents to a Medscape survey said that they either have not heard of, don't know a lot about, or know a little bit about the Medicare Access and CHIP Reauthorization Act of 2015 (MACRA) and its core components.

Read the full article here.

Learn more about nThrive's MACRA Management Solution.

title: From Value-Based Care to AI, Imaging Leaders Look to Radiology's Future
description: Medical imaging leaders are facing a number of challenges in the ongoing transformation of care delivery, yet many of the key market forces that are changing the field also are pushing imaging toward innovation, according to many imaging informatics leaders at a recent conference in New York City.
